alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:13AM CST until February 02 at 2:01PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Sabine River Near Deweyville Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier For the Sabine River...including Deweyville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Neches River...including Neches River Saltwater Barrier... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pine Island Bayou...including Sour Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 915 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pine Island Bayou near Sour Lake. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water inundates roads in lowland areas near the river. Low spots on Old Sour Lake Road are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 27.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CST Sunday was 27.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pine Island Bayou Sour Lake 25.0 27.4 Sun 8 am CST 27.5 27.3 26.8 &&
